title: Iteration
content:
for ? loops through a block of code, a number of times

for/in ? loops through the properties of an array/object

while loops though a block of code while a specifiedcondition is true

do/while ? also loops through a block of code while aspecified condition is true  

array var person = ["john", "doe", 54] access: person[0]

object var person = {firstname: "john", Lastname:"doe", age:46} access: person["firstname"] or person.firstname

common objects : Math objects(max(x,y), floor(x))

                StringObjects (split())

                Dataobjects

                Documentobjects
